title: Trump defends Saudi prince over journalist's murder, woos him with lavish White House welcome
subhead: The Saudi royal, who came bearing a pledge of a $1 trillion investment in the US on his first visit since the 2018 killing, said journalist Jamal Khashoggi's murder was 'painful' and a 'huge mistake.' The White House later announced a deal on the sale of US F-35 warplanes.

title: Former dancer Silvère Jarrosson becomes painter at intersection of art and science
